alquimia.copy: Just like ancient alchemy sought to turn metals into gold, our purpose is to transform pain, insecurity, or wear into {{b}}, {{c}}, and {{l}}.

philosophy.title: Brand philosophy
philosophy.quote: A renewed smile is not only aligned or white teeth; it is a mirror of the soul that reflects self-love, confidence, and personal power.
philosophy.p1: Here, every treatment becomes a ritual of transformation: each veneer, smile design, and aesthetic detail is a key that opens doors to a new version of yourself.

testimonials.subtitle: Every patient brings a dream. Here you‚Äôll find real stories from those who trusted Alquimia Dental to smile with confidence again.
testimonials.moreText: Want to read more real reviews?

alejandra.author: Alejandra Cabarique Garcia
alejandra.text: ‚ÄúA professional dedicated to her patients, very responsible and detail-oriented; but also human and full of empathy. It‚Äôs the first time I‚Äôve found a dentist who doesn‚Äôt scare me during procedures. I recommend her üòå‚Äù

milena.author: Milena Gracia
milena.text: ‚ÄúI‚Äôd like to express my complete satisfaction with the service provided by Dr. Sorany, who gave me a smile design that exceeded all my expectations. From the first moment she showed professionalism, guiding me clearly and thoroughly through the entire process. The result gave me great confidence when smiling. She used top-quality materials and her recommendations were very clear. Totally recommended!‚Äù

carlos.author: Carlos Libardo Lopez Penaloza
carlos.text: ‚ÄúI used to be terrified of dentists‚Ä¶ and with Dr. Sorany I found a professional who understands nervous patients like me. I was so delighted that I recommended many friends and brought my son for treatment. Thank you so much!‚Äù

angelica.author: Ang√©lica Parra
angelica.text: ‚ÄúExcellent work! I went in urgently for a broken filling. They treated me warmly and professionally, explaining not only the urgent issue but also the general state of my teeth. Recommended for her polished work: I was very happy with the result.‚Äù

brigitte.author: Brigitte Martinez D.
brigitte.text: ‚ÄúExcellent oral rehabilitator. I had an emergency with my veneers and Dr. Sorany explained and recommended what was best for my dental health. After the procedure the result was wonderful: she gave me my smile back. Highly recommended!‚Äù

john.author: John Ortiz
john.text: ‚ÄúI recommend Dr. Sorany‚Äôs work. She is very punctual and clear from the start without stretching out or overpricing the treatment. She made 2 crowns and several fillings for me; I was very satisfied with her work.‚Äù

dayanna.author: Dayanna S√°nchez
dayanna.text: ‚ÄúDr. Sorany has treated me for more than 8 years and she is a great professional. Her diagnoses are always accurate and her way of working is impeccable. Highly recommended.‚Äù
